snippet: Contaminated sites, often in poor neighborhoods, make good starting points for collaborative efforts with government, health care organizations have discovered.
abstract: Health care organizations find that contaminated sites, often in poor neighborhoods, make good starting points for collaborative efforts with government to build health centers and improve health of communities, providing much-needed services and facilities.
lead_paragraph: Contaminated sites, often in poor neighborhoods, make good starting points for collaborative efforts with government, health care organizations have discovered.

headline.seo: Health Centers Find Opportunity in Brownfields
headline.main: Health Centers Find Opportunity in Brownfields
headline.print_headline: Health Centers Find Opportunity in Brownfields
